content.question: A firm is producing the allocatively efficient level of output if

choices.label: total revenue is equal to total cost
marginal revenue is equal to marginal cost
price is equal to average total cost
price is equal to marginal cost
price is equal to total cost

content.answer: price is equal to marginal cost
